title: Help Me!
body: I believe some dude on my friends list tried to scam me in league of legends chat. He said there is a site that gives you free RP if you enter in your username and password,----------------------------------- I was dumb enough to enter in my user name and password and it said that I would get free RP in 6 hours. I told this to my friend and he says that its possible a big scam and that I should change my passcode immidently. So I changed my passcode to a different one in a few minutes. As I was starting my regular day of League of legends I noticed that I wasn't getting IP on my account and I did a few more games to make sure, When I knew I wasn't getting anymore IP and it automatically stopped at 1500IP and didn't go up I got worried so I'm asking for some help to make sure if this is normal or if this is a scam or if I could get help. Thanks

replies.body: Reach out to our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) when you have the chance! They'll be able to work with you to make sure your account is still safe and give some tips to help secure it even more. Feel free to look over our little [**Phishing Website FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204230720) as well for tips on how to spot these malicious websites.
Ok man thanks for the help.
